org.efaps.update.version

Class ApplicationVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.update.version.ApplicationVersion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<ApplicationVersion>

    @ObjectCreate(pattern="install/version")
public class ApplicationVersion
extends Object
implements Comparable<ApplicationVersion>
    Defines one version of the application to install.
    Version:
    $Id$ TODO: in case of a script: it must be possible to deactivate the context
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

    • Method Detail

      • install

        public void install(Install _install,
           long _latestVersionNumber,
           Set<Profile> _profiles,
           String _userName,
           String _password)
             throws InstallationException
        Installs the XML update scripts of the schema definitions for this version defined in number.
        Parameters:
        _install - install instance with all cached XML definitions
        _latestVersionNumber - latest version number (defined in the version.xml file)
        _profiles - profiles to be applied
        _userName - name of logged in user
        _password - password of logged in user
        Throws:
        InstallationException - on error

      • addScript

        @CallMethod(pattern="install/version/script")
public void addScript(@CallParam(pattern="install/version/script")
                        String _code,
                        @CallParam(pattern="install/version/script",attributeName="type")
                        String _type,
                        @CallParam(pattern="install/version/script",attributeName="name")
                        String _name,
                        @CallParam(pattern="install/version/script",attributeName="function")
                        String _function)
        Adds a new Script to this version.
        Parameters:
        _code - code of script to execute
        _type - type of the code, groovy, rhino
        _name - file name of the script
        _function - name of function which is called

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        The description for this version is returned. If no description exists, a zero length description is returned.
        Returns:
        string value of instance variable description
        See Also:

      • addIgnoredStep

        @CallMethod(pattern="install/version/lifecyle/ignore")
public void addIgnoredStep(@CallParam(pattern="install/version/lifecyle/ignore",attributeName="step")
                             String _step)
        Appends a step which is ignored within the installation of this version.
        Parameters:
        _step - ignored step
        See Also:
        ignoredSteps

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(ApplicationVersion _compareTo)
        Compares this application version with the specified application version.
        The method compares the version number of the application version. To do this, the method Long.compareTo(java.lang.Long) is called.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<ApplicationVersion>
        Parameters:
        _compareTo - application version instance to compare to
        Returns:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this application version is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified application version
        See Also:
        Long.compareTo(java.lang.Long), Comparable.compareTo(T)

      • getCompleteRootUrl

        protected URL getCompleteRootUrl()
                          throws InstallationException
        Returns the complete root URL so that resources in the installation package could be fetched. If an installation from the source directory is done, the root URL is directly returned, in the case that an installation is done from a JAR container the root URL is appended with the name of the root package name.
        Returns:
        complete root URL
        Throws:
        InstallationException - if complete root URL could not be prepared

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a string representation with values of all instance variables.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        string representation of this Application
